### Review Comment Rule
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
r: Please make sure to fix it. Please consider it actively. (Request changes)

c: Please fix as much as possible. I have a question. (Comment)

a: You can fix it or move on. It's just a trivial opinion. (Approve)
